thread.title: Medtronic Revenue Boosted by Covidien Acquisition
thread.title_full: Medtronic Revenue Boosted by Covidien Acquisition - WSJ

author: Angela Chen
title: Medtronic Revenue Boosted by Covidien Acquisition
text:
Medtronic PLC reported on Thursday that revenue rose 12% in its latest quarter, helped by its recent acquisition of Covidien PLC.
Thursday’s report marks the second round of results since the device manufacturer’s $50 billion acquisition of Covidien closed in January. The Covidien deal, which combined two of the world’s largest surgical-implant and hospital-supply companies, closed in late January after drawing scrutiny over a tax-lowering tactic criticized by U.S. government officials. The acquisition involved Medtronic...
